tagline.title: BALI TREKKING AND SWING TOUR IS DOUBLE ACTIVITY FOR DO MOUNT BATUR SUNRISE TREKKING AND DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING
tagline.text: BALI TREKKING AND SWING TOUR IS DOUBLE ACTIVITY FOR DO MOUNT BATUR SUNRISE TREKKING AND DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING
tagline.html: BALI TREKKING AND SWING TOUR IS DOUBLE ACTIVITY FOR DO MOUNT BATUR SUNRISE TREKKING AND DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING

description.text: Bali Trekking and Swing Tour is Bali Double Activities Tour is great double activity for enjoy mount batur surinse trekking and then continue for do jungle swing at Bali swing, is great activity for see sunrise at top mount batur with amazing panorama view and then continue for visit Bali swing and enjoy the challeng jungle swing, take picture at bird nest and other beautiful spot in this place. the first trip starts in the morning, where the driver will pick up at the hotel where you are staying and go straight to the starting trekking point in mount batur, arriving there you will be greeted by a local trekking guide who will guide you to the summit and see a spectacular view that is to see the sunrise at Gunung Batur, and you will enjoy a lite breakfast of bread and eggs which are included in this package, after finishing we will go to the finish point, arriving at the finish point we will continue the journey to the Bali Swing to begin the swinging adventure the forest with amazing views, and also taking photos at the bird cage and other photo spots in Bali Swing, finished swing activities we will eat lunch buffet Indonesian food in this place, after lunch we will go to the hotel while bringing experience impressive during Bali Trekking and Swing Tour

title.title: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour | Bali Trekking and Swing Tour Packages
title.text: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour
title.html: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour

image.title: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour | Bali Trekking and Swing Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour is best hiking adventure to see the sunrise from the top of the mountain. Mount Batur is located in Batur village, Kintamani District, Bali, Indonesia. Mount Batur (Gunung Batur) is 1717 m above sea level can be summited by physically fit hikers in around 2 hours. Mount Batur Bali is an active volcano that draws tourists in with both beauty and promise of spectacular trekking tours. We offers climb Mount Batur Bali to enjoy an unforgettable sunrise from the top of an active volcano. Spectacular scenery and the vibration of the sacred earth filling your mind and soul as u served by tasty morning breakfast cooked by the steam of the active volcano.
description.html: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour is best hiking adventure to see the sunrise from the top of the mountain. title.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Trekking and Swing Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Trekking and Swing Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. Swing in Bali is an activity that has just been introduced, but because of the enthusiasm of the tourists who want to try this activity making swing activities famous among domestic and foreign tourists. The activity is located in the village of Bongkasa, close to Ubud. And this swing attraction can be combined with several tours to visit tourism objects in Bali.
description.html: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. price.title: Bali Trekking and Swing Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Trekking and Swing Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,700,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,150,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 850,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 800,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 775,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking

Bali Trekking and Swing Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Trekking at Mount Batur
  • Jungle Swing at Bali Swing
  • Lite Breakfast (Bread and Egg) during trekking
  • Professional Trekking and Rafting Tour Guide
  • Lunch buffet Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water

content.event: Enjoy Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour
Trekking Finish and Continue the tour
Enjoy Jungle Swing at Bali Swing

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
